column5: If "true", the process SHALL generate 1 PDF file per page.
If "true", embedded EPS files in PostScript source documents SHALL not be converted but SHALL be stored in external files in the same location as the PDF itself. (PostScript source only)
If "true", font data MAY be stored in external files during PDF generation.

If "true", image data MAY be stored in an external stream during the PDF generation phase. Note: This prevents large amounts of image data from having to be passed through all phases of the code generation process.
